channel.title: 2 problems Im looking for help on
channel.description: Hey, *My first problem is I just need to know what file the "Quest Journal" is in. I am looking to change what it says in there. *Second I need to know how I can change the color of text in my server. Its not the text that comes out, its the color of the text before you hit enter.

item.title: 2 problems Im looking for help on
item.dc:creator: @jandascape90 jandascape90
item.description:
@jandascape90 wrote:

Ooh. Then try something like:

sendQuest("::home", 7332); break;

Then compile go in game and click on black knight’s fortress it should change to ::home.
=D

item.source: 2 problems Im looking for help on

item.title: 2 problems Im looking for help on
item.dc:creator: @jandascape90 jandascape90
item.description:
@jandascape90 wrote:

Well as for the Quest Journal, try to add in this:

sendQuest("YOUR NEW 'QUEST' NAME, 7332); //put code to make it say this in the box here break;
I’m not sure where to add this, but you can add this somewhere and make it say this when you click Black Knight’s Fortress.
Like, 7332 is the ID for the black knight’s fortress spot.
And like 7333 for the next quest and so on, but some are out of order.

Read full topic
